Headline: US coronavirus:  York reaches vaccine milestone and joins California in reopening - CNN
Text: By Steve Almasy, Laura Ly, Holly Yan and Madeline Holcombe, CNNUpdated 7:03 PM ET, Tue June 15, 2021  (CNN)Tuesday brought reopenings in two of the largest states, with New York reaching an important vaccine milestone and joining California in dropping most of its Covid-19 restrictions.Interactive: Tracking Covid-19 vaccinations in the USCNN's Arman Azad, Maggie Fox, Naomi Thomas, Sarah Dean, Jen Christensen, Virginia Langmaid and Cheri Mossburg contributed to this report.
